# SEQ28 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 28 focuses on give the walls some depth

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl197, apl198, apl199, apl200, apl201, apl202, apl203, apl204

## Emergent Phenomena
Walls with depth that provide storage, seating, and architectural richness

## Overview
This sequence contains 8 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
